amendment.description: An amendment numbered 115 printed in Part B of House Report 115-119 to prevent funds from being used to remove existing information about climate change from official publications.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Underwood amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Underwood amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A044) offered by Ms. Underwood.
